context.p: Stage your current instance pages to see how your changes will appear on the production site. Then, promote the changes to production so your users can begin using them.

li.p: Go to the Customer Portal administration page (https://<your_site>/ci/admin/), click Development Mode from the dashboard. The Customer Portal site opens in the development mode.
Preview your development pages to verify your changes in the development mode.
Promote your changes to stage and production from the Customer Portal administration page.

context.p: You can find more information about staging and promoting changes into production in Using B2C Service.
